alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 11:57AM CDT until March 28 at 4:21PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Big River at Byrnesville. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big River at Byrnesville. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.5 feet, Burgan Grove Road begins flooding near Cottage Grove Road, cutting off access to Cottage Grove Road. Highway W near Hoene Spring is closed as water crosses the pavement. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 3.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 24.4 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Big River Byrnesville 16.0 3.9 11.7 20.1 24.4 19.9 11.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted, while lesser amounts could result in a lower crest. The National Weather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
